entities.name: DELAWARE
entities.description: State whose law governs the interpretation, performance, and enforcement of the Agreement

entities.name: CALIFORNIA
entities.description: State where the exclusive jurisdiction for litigating disputes related to the Agreement is located

entities.name: SANTA CLARA COUNTY
entities.description: County in California with exclusive jurisdiction for litigating disputes related to the Agreement

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: Entity with rights and obligations under the Award which can be transferred to successors and assigns

relationships.relationship_description: Santa Clara County is located within the state of California, and has exclusive jurisdiction for litigating disputes related to the Agreement
The Company must follow Delaware's law for the interpretation, performance, and enforcement of the Agreement
The Company agrees to litigate any disputes related to the Agreement in the state of California, specifically in Santa Clara County or the federal courts for the Northern District of California
